model.cargo
Class Trip

java.lang.Object
  model.cargo.Trip

public class Trip
extends java.lang.Object

This class is a trip and consists of just gets and sets for a trip

Constructor Detail

Trip

public Trip(java.lang.String trip_idx,
            java.lang.String maquila_idx,
            java.lang.String maquila_namex,
            java.lang.String poe_idx,
            java.lang.String bridgex,
            java.lang.String vehicle_owner_idx,
            java.lang.String vehicle_owner_namex,
            java.lang.String vinx,
            java.lang.String planned_route_idx,
            CoordStr f,
            CoordStr t)
This is the complete Trip constructor, this constructor is preferred in most cases, but the shorter one is used in some instances

Parameters:
trip_idx - the trip id
maquila_idx - the maquila id
maquila_namex - the maquila's name
poe_idx - the id for the por of entry
bridgex - the bridge in use for this trip
vehicle_owner_idx - the id of the vehicle owner
vehicle_owner_namex - the name of the vehicle owner
vinx - the vin for the truck
planned_route_idx - planned route from the set of planned routes
f - coordinate of departure "from"
t - coordinate of destination "to"

Method Detail

addPoint

public void addPoint(Coord p)
adds a point to the trace of the trip, this method should be called whenever the truck moves, and will be the same as a the planned route unless an event creates a reroute on the trip and the truck has to take an alternate route

Parameters:
p -
